Charles Robert Darwin was born

into a wealthy physician’s family

on February 12, 1809

in Shrewsbury, England.

Darwin was the fifth of six children and had three older sisters, one older brother and one younger sister.

As the daughter of Josiah Wedgwood, founder of the famous Wedgwood pottery company, Darwin’s mother Susannah was also born into a wealthy family.

When Darwin was eight years old,

his mother died after a battle with cancer.

Mommy!

Oh…
